summary: Matthew Avery Modine  is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actor.
full_text: Matthew Avery Modine  is an American film actor. His best-known film roles include Private Joker in Stanley Kubrick's Full Metal Jacket, the title character in Alan Parker's Birdy, high school wrestler Louden Swain in Vision Quest, and oversexed Sullivan Groff on Weeds.
title: Matthew Modine
